verses.verse: And I <S%H7725>turned,<s%> and <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4818>chariots<s%> out from <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>
In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4818>chariot<s%> were <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H5483>horses;<s%> and in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H5483>horses;<s%>

And in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H5483>horses;<s%> and in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H1261>spotted<s%> and <S%H554>bay<s%> <S%H5483>horses.<s%>
Then I <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me, <S%H4100>What<s%> are <S%H428>these,<s%> my <S%H113>lord?<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>spirits<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> which <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H3320>standing<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> the <S%H113>LORD<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The <S%H7838>black<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are therein <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country;<s%> and the <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them; and the <S%H1261>spotted<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H8486>south<s%> <S%H776>country.<s%>

And the <S%H554>bay<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> that they might <S%H1980>walk<s%> to and fro through the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>Get<s%> you <S%H3212>hence,<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> to and fro through the <S%H776>earth.<s%> So they <S%H1980>walked<s%> to and fro through the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Then <S%H2199>cried<s%> he on me, and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7200>Behold,<s%> these that <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> have <S%H5117>quieted<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> of them of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> even of <S%H2469>Heldai,<s%> of <S%H2900>Tobijah,<s%> and of <S%H3048>Jedaiah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> you the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6846>Zephaniah;<s%>

Then <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H5850>crowns,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> them on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Josedech,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

And <S%H559>speak<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>speaks<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is The <S%H6780>BRANCH;<s%> and he shall <S%H6779>grow<s%> up out of his <S%H8478>place,<s%> and he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

Even he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H1935>glory,<s%> and shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H4910>rule<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne;<s%> and he shall be a <S%H3548>priest<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne:<s%> and the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> shall be <S%H996>between<s%> them <S%H8147>both.<s%>

And the <S%H5850>crowns<s%> shall be to <S%H2494>Helem,<s%> and to <S%H2900>Tobijah,<s%> and to <S%H3048>Jedaiah,<s%> and to <S%H2581>Hen<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6846>Zephaniah,<s%> for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they that are <S%H7350>far<s%> off shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you. And <S%H2063>this<s%> shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, if you will diligently <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
